version_description: Credit Cards are stored and secured by MasterCard secure system.
Bug fıxes
- Bug fixes
Pay with Hopi coins!

- Distributor rating is added
- Payment type and discount amount is added to Orders section

Service ratings for water brands
Changing brand is much simpler
Possible to see product categories and listing brands with those
Easily compare and sort brands according to price, pH value and service rating
See active campaigns
Brands quality and health reports are included
Selecting products while ordering is much simpler

Updates and bug fixes
iPhoneX support
BKM Express updated! Now easier to login or signup!

- With BKM Express, you can now use debit cards of the following banks, Akbank, Garanti, İş Bankası, Yapı Kredi Bankası.
- Simpler to change your card at BKM Express Wallet.

You, the BiSU user, deserve the best!

We have been working hard to make water ordering experience even more user friendly and smooth. Of course, our ultimate aim is to make you happier!

At this last update, you can reschedule delivery for next day after ‘working’ hours. Also, you can delete Hopi/BKM accounts with a simple slide to the left.

We are always in need of your feedback. You can also write to us to at destek@bisu.com.tr. Let's get BiSU even better together!
Registration problem that some users faced is solved.
Address registration problem happening for some phones is fixed.

We care about you and your feedback.

You can now delete the addresses with just a swipe.

You can always reach out to us at geribildirim@bisu.com.tr and let us know about your feedback and recommendations.

Summer is coming for BiSU Users :sun_with_face:

We fixes some bugs on order screen and we will have some news on this screen!

If you have some ideas and feedbacks for us, keep in touch from geribildirim@bisu.com.tr

Do not forget to follow us
Bugs fixed.

We are working so hard for the good news.
We have done updates for the next coming features so that you will get to know the new stuff soon.
You can always reach out to us at geribildirim@bisu.com.tr and let us know about your feedback and recommendations.

We are working so hard for the good news.
We have a surprise for making your life even easier! For now it is only in Istanbul. Hope you will like it.
You can always reach out to us at geribildirim@bisu.com.tr and let us know about your feedback and recommendations.

Important crash and bug fixes are done.
- Login using BKM Express crash is fixed.
- Other crash fixes

You get used to order water everyday with just one click, now it's time to experience Bi'market for your everyday needs. Hope you will like it.

Bi'market is for İstanbul only for now but we are working hard to reach you all.

You can always reach out to us at geribildirim@bisu.com.tr and let us know about your feedback and recommendations.

We keep on working to make your life easier and have a better experience with our application. With this new version;
- you can share the campaigns with your friends.
- iOS 13 screen problems are fixed.
- and many other bugs fixes and improvements.
Please do not hesitate to give us feedback. You can always reach us from by writing to geribildirim@bisu.com.tr.

We keep on working to make your life easier and have a better experience with our application. With this new version;
- you can share the campaigns with your friends.
- Easier communication when you want to reach us from email in the app
- iOS 13 screen problems are fixed.
- and many other bugs fixes and improvements.
Please do not hesitate to give us feedback. You can always reach us from by writing to geribildirim@bisu.com.tr.
Small bug fix for the Bimarket campaigns
Small bug fix

We keep on working to make your life easier so you can save your time for shopping and enjoy those times yourself or with the loved ones. In this release, to provide a better BiSU experience, we have,
- better Bi'market browsing experience so you can find what you need among our wide range of products
- fix for iOS13 devices having the order button cut out of the screen
- fix for showing credit card warnings
- find the best deals at Bi'market quicker and easier
- fixes and improvements for smoother BiSU experience.

You can always reach out to us at geribildirim@bisu.com.tr and let us know about your feedback and recommendations.

We keep on working for making life easier for you. This release is very special. Now we have Bi'market for Ankara, after Istanbul and Izmit.

We also made new shopping lists for your events and needs. You can add all your items at once to your shopping cart. Don't miss to check Bi'dolu firsat where you see all discounted items.

We are grateful for your help to make BiSU better.

We work non-stop to make life easier with BiSU. We continue to make improvements so that you can spare the time you spend for the needs of your home and your loved ones. Here are the innovations we developed for a better BiSU experience in this version;
To make it easier for you to share your order with your family and friends at Bi'market, We have made delicious interface improvements.
In Bi'market, We made improvements to remove product from your cart more easily.
We've made technical improvements and interface improvements for a better BiSU experience.
We evaluate every comment and feedback to further develop BiSU. You can mail anything you want to convey to us at feedback@bisu.com.tr.
This release fixes the issue for some users being blocked while ordering at Bi'market.

This version is a humble applaud for all the medical staff fighting with Corona Virus. We are so grateful to you all for helping humanity!
Bug fix: Time slots update problem is fixed when delivery address is changed.

We work hard to make life easier with BiSU. We continue to improve our app so you can easily order and have more time for yourselves and your beloved ones. Here are the innovations we developed for a better BiSU experience in this version;
You can now change the date of your order once. You will be able to add new products to your existing order in a short time.
We made the discount rates of discounted products more easily noticeable.
We changed our logo on our home page with applause animation to respect everyone who is outside for us on hard days.
We've made technical improvements and interface improvements for a better BiSU experience.
We evaluate every comment and feedback to further develop BiSU. You can mail anything you want to convey to us at geribildirim@bisu.com.tr.

We work hard to make life easier with BiSU. We continue to improve our app so you can easily order and have more time for yourselves and your beloved ones. Here are the innovations we developed for a better BiSU experience in this version;
- Now in Bi'market it is easier to find what you are looking for. You can access the list containing product you are looking for with one click in search screen.
- For those who have extended shopping list, we have made a recommendation section where we show the opportunity products.
- We've made technical improvements and interface improvements for a better BiSU experience.
We evaluate every comment and feedback to further develop BiSU. You can mail anything you want to convey to us at geribildirim@bisu.com.tr.

We have been working for a long time to make the water ordering experience even easier.

Here is the new BiSU! In this version;
- Our interface is given a simpler look,
- Now you can easily edit your profile information,
- You can easily browse the products with new brand and product filters,
- Now you can give detailed feedbacks for each order,
- Bi'market option, which serves in certain regions, becomes more visible.

Also;
- Language file problem solved
- Crossing between pages problem solved
- Minor interface bugs fixed

Please share your ordering experience and comments with us via geribildirim@bisu.com.tr.
In this update, we are publishing many experiences and performance improvements we have realized in line with your feedback.
Major bug fix: The problem of logout the active user after the update has been fixed.
Edit: Fixed the issue where credit cards were listed in payment methods.

We are continuously working on improving your experience. In this version you will find;
More plain Adresses UI
Some problems you have encountered while using the application.

Feel free to write to us your order experiences using Write Us section in the application.
